|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.11.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = Buffalo-G-XXXX,Buffalo-A-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Buffalo-G-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,,^Buffalo-A-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117G |manuf_rev = AC33 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato-ARM |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/17/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 747464126791 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00D69747O |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141911720001J R0B1" appears to be silkscreened on the main board.
"141911620001J" and "PATENT PENDING" is silkscreened on the antennas. Additional info, per the FCC internal photos... *The 5 GHz radio is using three [[Skyworks]] SE5003L1 5 GHz PAM. *The 2.4 GHz radio is using three [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=131895&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=1700613 SE2605L] PAM. *The capacitors appear to be from '''TAICON'''. Default settings and SSID patterns (which appear to be '''Buffalo-A-XXXX''' :and '''Buffalo-G-XXXX''') are from the FCC manual. ==Links of Interest== ==Reviews== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32208-buffalo-wzr-1750dhp-airstation-extreme-ac1750-gigabit-dual-band-wireless-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/171-buffalo-wzr-1750dhp.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing Tomato=== Supported by [https://wiki.freshtomato.org/doku.php/hardware_compatibility FreshTomato K26ARM (SDK6.37)], [https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/buffalo-wzr-1750dhp-bricked.74962/#post-333522 please read first] ==Pictures==

[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] ==Notes== ===PSU=== The power adapter shown in the FCC documents is an '''Asian Power Devices''' :APD DA-48Q12 (100~240VAC 50~60Hz 1.2A max. -> 12VDC 4A) ==See also== *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H22 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H33 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117EAC22 (BCM4708A0) *Buffalo WZR-1750DHP • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117GAC33 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-D1800H]] • [[Arcadyan]] WA9116BAC33 (BCM4706) [[Category:English Documentation]]
